# vyos Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    vyos = {
      version = "0.x.x"
      source  = "foltik/vyos"
    }
  }
}

provider "vyos" {
  url = "https://vyos.local"
  key = "xxxxxxxxx"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **key** (String, Sensitive)
- **url** (String)

### Optional

- **cert** (String)
- **save** (Boolean) Save after making changes in Vyos
- **save_file** (String) File to save configuration. Uses config.boot by default.
